aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan for Accident
The accident site had Visual Meteorological Conditions (VMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was Day.
The observation facility was GEZ.
GEZ is at an elevation of 803 feet mean sea level.
The observation facility was 37 Nautical Miles from the accident site.
The observation time was 14:53 Local.
The observation facility was 258° from the accident site.
The lowest cloud condition was Few clouds at 7000 feet Above Ground Level.
The visibility was 10 miles.
There was no ceiling at the accident site.
The wind speed was 16 knots.
The wind had gusts of 25 knots.
No turbulence was forecast or actual.
The wind direction was 290°.
Turbulence severity forecast was not available.
Turbulence severity actual was not applicable.
The altimeter setting was 29.86 inches of mercury.
The temperature was 20°C.
The dew point was 2°C.
There was no obscuration at the accident site.
There was no precipitation at the accident site.
The departure point was Cambridge, OH.
Cambridge, OH has the airport code CDI.
No flight plan was filed.
The destination was Connersville, IN.
Connersville, IN has the airport code CEV.
No clearance was obtained.
The departure time was 10:40 Local.
The airspace type was Class E.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

## Conditions at Accident Site: Visual (VMC)
Condition of Light: Day

## Observation Facility, Elevation: GEZ,803 ft msl
Distance from Accident Site: 37 Nautical Miles

## Observation Time: 14:53 Local
Direction from Accident Site: 258°

## Lowest Cloud Condition: Few / 7000 ft AGL
Visibility: 10 miles

## Lowest Ceiling: None
Visibility (RVR):

## Wind Speed/Gusts: 16 knots / 25 knots
Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual: / None

## Wind Direction: 290°
Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual: / N/A

## Altimeter Setting: 29.86 inches Hg
Temperature/Dew Point: 20°C / 2°C

## Precipitation and Obscuration: No Obscuration; No Precipitation

## Departure Point: Cambridge, OH (CDI )
Type of Flight Plan Filed: None

## Destination: Connersville, IN (CEV )
Type of Clearance: None

## Departure Time: 10:40 Local
Type of Airspace: Class E

---
